alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:08AM CDT until August 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR WOODS...ALFALFA AND NORTHEASTERN WOODWARD COUNTIES... At 408 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Avard, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Alva, Cherokee, Helena, Waynoka, Carmen, Goltry, Jet, Aline, Burlington, Dacoma, Amorita, Byron, Lambert, Avard, Ingersoll, Great Salt Plains Lake, Driftwood, Capron, Waldron, and Hopeton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
